name: Explanatory Output Style
description: Adds educational insights about implementation choices and codebase patterns (mimics the deprecated Explanatory output style)
longDescription: Installs a `session-start` hook (shell script) that injects instructions making Claude add educational insight blocks before and after code changes. Each block contains 2-3 points explaining why specific implementations were chosen, what codebase patterns were followed, and what trade-offs exist. Recreates the deprecated Explanatory output style from Claude Code settings.
